text: Archery was introduced at the 1977 Southeast Asian Games and was held at the Petaling Jaya Club from Nov 23 to Nov 24 1977. ==Medal table== ==Medalists== ===Recurve=== {| |- |Men's individual | | | |- |Men's 90M | | | |- |Men's 70M | | | |- |Men's 50M | | | |- |Men's 30M | | | |- |Men's team | | | |- style="background:#dddddd;" |colspan=7| |- |Women's individual | | | |- |Women's 70M | | | |- |Women's 60M | | | |- |Women's 50M | | | |- |Women's 30M | | | |- |Women's team | | | |} ==Results== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Country!!Name!!90m!!70m!!50m!!30m!!Total |- |||Donald Pandiangan||261||306||316||345||1228 |- |||June Santos||276||306||310||335||1227 |- |||Cheng Jun||273||302||301||339||1215 |- |||Suhartomo||255||297||312||339||1203 |- |||Raffy Recto||260||275||312||334||1181 |- |||Vallop Potaya||270||281||277||337||1165 |- |||Adang Adjidji||245||295||286||334||1160 |- |||Michael Ng Yew Hui|| ||301||299|| ||1159 |- |||Sa-Ngad K.|| ||281||292|| || |- |||Bill Wee Hock Kee|| || || ||333|| |- |||Remy Yap Lee Fui||247|| || || || |- |||Mohammad Idrus|| || ||309|| || |} ===Women=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Country!!Name!!70m!!60m!!50m!!30m!!Total |- |||Jojie Guerrero||272||289||294||325||1180 |- |||Sam Tan Pek Hoon||268||289||285||325||1167 |- |||Cheryll Ng Sok Ping||279||287||269||322||1157 |- |||Carla Ramos||270||281||276||324||1151 |- |||Amornrat Kaewbaidhoon||272||291||277||306||1146 |- |||Suminar Rachmat||279||283||270||313||1145 |- |||Maimona bt.
